mapper.select: select competeOrgName,eventNumAll, CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(concat(name,':',orgEventNum,':',competeOrgEventNum) order by id asc) ) as orgJson from ( select id,name, d.competeOrgName,if(orgEventNum is null,0,orgEventNum) as orgEventNum,if(competeOrgEventNum is null,0,competeOrgEventNum) as competeOrgEventNum ,d.eventNumAll from ( select * from( select id,name from app_industry where parentId = #{industryId} ) as a join (select competeOrgName,eventNumAll from app_chart_project_org_compete where industryType = #{industryType} and timeType = #{timeType} and orgCode= #{orgCode} GROUP BY competeOrgName,eventNumAll ) as b) as d LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from app_chart_project_org_compete where industryType = #{industryType} and timeType = #{timeType} and orgCode= #{orgCode} ) AS c on d.id = c.industryId and d.competeOrgName=c.competeOrgName ORDER BY id ) as ff where eventNumAll != 0 GROUP BY competeOrgName,eventNumAll ORDER BY eventNumAll desc limit 10

select competeOrgName,eventNumAll, CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(concat(name,':',orgEventNum,':',competeOrgEventNum) order by id asc) ) as orgJson from ( select id,name, d.competeOrgName,if(orgEventNum is null,0,orgEventNum) as orgEventNum,if(competeOrgEventNum is null,0,competeOrgEventNum) as competeOrgEventNum ,d.eventNumAll from ( select * from( select id,name from app_industry where parentId = #{industryId} ) as a join (select competeOrgName,eventNumAll from app_chart_project_org_compete where industryType = #{industryType} and timeType = #{timeType} and industryId=#{industryId} and orgCode= #{orgCode} GROUP BY competeOrgName,eventNumAll ) as b) as d LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from app_chart_project_org_compete where industryType = #{industryType} and timeType = #{timeType} and orgCode= #{orgCode} and industryId=#{industryId}) AS c on d.id = c.industrySubId and d.competeOrgName=c.competeOrgName ORDER BY id ) as ff where eventNumAll != 0 GROUP BY competeOrgName,eventNumAll ORDER BY eventNumAll desc limit 10
